titleStmt.title: The Lord Balmerino's speech in the High Court of Parliament in Scotland spoken Novem. 4, 1641 concerning the levying of an army against the papists in Ireland : describing their conspiracies which have a long time insulted and continued against these two kingdomes of England and Scotland.
Speech in the High Court of Parliament in Scotland spoken Novem. 4, 1641
titleStmt.author: Balmerino, John Elphinstone, Baron, d. 1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
